subject: Interview Invitation for Marketing Manager Role at NovaTech Inc.
body:
Hi Emily,

We were thrilled to review your resume and would like to invite you to an interview for the Marketing Manager position at NovaTech Inc.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 13 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Ryan Thompson, Director of Marketing, who will discuss the role and answer any questions you may have about our company culture and expectations.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Ava Lee
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
